title: Person of Interest - Shaw and Finch Captured
author: IGN
comment: Root OMG her personality seems to get sexier and sexier every episode
I remember one day I was browsing TV - bored of gaming and I watched one random show of Person of Interest.  Now I watch it religiously.
Awesome. This show never ceased to thrill. No "slow and repeating" style of most TV show.
Pretty much the only good show on tv atm along with almost human.
description: Finch, Shaw and Arthur (guest star Saul Rubinek) are in big trouble in this clip from the January 7th episode.
